item.title: Ancient Oak Tree
item.description: ![[notes/images/ancient_oak_tree.png]] Ancient Oak Trees were added with the Dark Forest makeover. They generate throughout the Dark Forest Biome or with Ancient Oak Saplings in 1x1 and 2x2 variants.

item.title: Blighted Balsa
item.description: ![[notes/images/blighted_balsa.png]] Blighted Balsa Trees were added with the Mushroom Fields makeover. They generate throughout the Mushroom Fields Biome or with Blighted Balsa Sapling.

item.title: Single Dark Oak Tree
item.description: ![[notes/images/single_dark_oak.png]] Single Dark Oak Trees were added with the Dark Forest makeover. They generate throughout the Dark Forest Biome or grown with Dark Oak Saplings.

item.title: Swamp Cypress
item.description: ![[notes/images/swamp_cypress_tree.png]] Swamp Cypress Trees were added with the Swamp makeover. They generate throughout the Swamp Biome or with Swamp Cypress Saplings.

item.title: Willow Tree
item.description: ![[notes/images/willow_tree.png]] Willow Trees were added with the Swamp makeover. They generate throughout the Swamp Biome or with Willow Saplings. The trees can generate on land on in up to 2 deep water.
